author: jberry
msg: Merge most of the $Log$ --> $Id$ conversions from main trunk, originally
committed on 191036, 191038, 191045. This should help keep the 2.7 branch
files in a little closer condition to the 3.0 files.
This omits changes for the tests and samples directories, as those are no longer
in the same place, and so missed the merge.

author: crossley
msg: Add other steps: Vote on final release candidate. Merge trunk to branch.

author: jberry
msg: Add const qualifier to getDocumentLocations to match interface (patch to 191040 for bug XERCESC-1153).

author: crossley
msg: Address Issue: FOR-545 "PDFs for the generated DTD documentation is going haywire"
Moved DTD documentation to top-level /dtdx/ because they don't need to be versioned.
Created project sitemap.xmap to serve raw pre-generated PDFs of the *.dtdx.pdf
